changeSet.author: vitikova
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE "public"."animal_type" ( "id" bigint DEFAULT nextval('animal_type_id_seq') NOT NULL, "name" character varying(255), CONSTRAINT "animal_type_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"), CONSTRAINT "ukjtn9d2he4ee6abgyi43w8r8o0" UNIQUE ("name") ) WITH (oids = false);
CREATE TABLE "public"."breed" ( "id" bigint DEFAULT nextval('breed_id_seq') NOT NULL, "name" character varying(255), "type_id" bigint, CONSTRAINT "breed_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id"), CONSTRAINT "ukk7fokt65aja7ald1r3ana2uwc" UNIQUE ("name") ) WITH (oids = false);
